Take Your Career to a Whole New Level Unisys is a worldwide information technology services and solutions company. In more than 100 countries we deliver the precision thinking and relentless execution that drives our clients' business transformation. We have some of the most exciting information technologies at our fingertips, but we know that the most important feature of our company is the people who work here.

Unisys is a global information technology company that builds high-performance, security-centric solutions for the most digitally demanding businesses and governments on Earth. Unisys offerings include security software and services; digital transformation and workplace services; industry applications and services; and innovative software operating environments for high-intensity enterprise computing.

For more information on how Unisys builds better outcomes securely for its clients across the Government, Financial Services and Commercial markets

IT Hardware Engineer

Job responsibilities (Key requirements):

  • Hands on experience with laptop and desktop break-fix, will mainly focus on the hardware replacement, also support part of software;
  • Mainly supported Lenovo’s customers, including companies and also individual customers to fix computer.
  • Fluent of Cantonese, English could be a plus.  
  • Strong outdoor PC experience – able to be mobile, need work around HK, need go to 5~6 places a day, but will try to arrange in nearby places.  
  • Employee is expected to work around their own transport needs, no car is provided, but travel and phone costs can be claimed(reimbursement).
Salary range:
  • up to 16k/m*13m (13 month is fixed)

Benefits:

  • Permanent job 
  • Medical insurance
  • 15 days annual leaves

  • Strong in issue resolution
  • Responsible and accountable
  • Strong customer service skills, someone who can work directly with client
  • Flexible to varied working conditions and requirements
  • Issue resolution skills
  • Follow through and responsiveness
  • Interested and motivated in the break fix role
  • Resolution orientation
  • Consultative approach
